author: Jonathan Lemire
title: As pandemic deepens, Trump cycles through targets to blame...
description: NEW YORK (AP) — First, it was the media that was at fault. Then, Democratic governors came under fire. China, President Barack Obama and federal watchdogs have all had a turn in the crosshairs....
content:
NEW YORK (AP) First, it was the media that was at fault. Then, Democratic governors came under fire. China, President Barack Obama and federal watchdogs have all had a turn in the crosshairs. And now its the World Health Organization thats to blame.
